conbody.p: Since there is the possibility that the thesaurus entry appears in external projects, the ID tab provides the opportunity to enter the external ID, thus linking the projects.
Choose the provider from the drop-down list.
Enter the type of the ID.
Enter the external ID here (e.g. Trismegistos).
Add another set of information, including the "Provider", "Type" and "External ID" in the case of multiple appearances of the used thesaurus entries in more than one project.
